content: --- title: Baggage Data Models description: published: true date: 2025-02-24T11:34:21.777Z tags: editor: markdown dateCreated: 2024-09-05T12:38:50.573Z --- # Baggage Info Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope * Baggage info: Flight leg list conditions(40 minutes and 20 minutes before Departure Time and 60 minutes, 120 minutes, and 180 minutes after Departure Time); * {Date Conditions} and * Date Conditions; * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) + 40 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date + 40 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) + 20 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date + 20 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 30 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 30 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 60 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 60 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 120 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 120 minutes) or * (`schedops.LEG.dep_DT` <= Current Date(UTC) - 180 minutes and `schedops.LEG.dep_DT` >= Last Data Retrieval Date - 180 minutes) * `schedops.LEG.WHAT_IF` = “_” and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_TYPE` = (“C“ or “J“ or “O“) and * `schedops.LEG.LEG_STATE` <> (“CNL“ or “DEL“ or “INC“) * Baggage status/reason: Mail Date > Last Data Retrieval Date #### - Source Service * Baggage info: `CustomerManifest` * WSDL: `https://iflyresapi.ibsgen.com/iRes_CheckIn_WS/services/ReportsPort` * Method: `getCustomerManifestInfo` * Baggage status/reason: * `microsoftonline` * URL: `https://login.microsoftonline.com/${tenant_id}/oauth2/v2.0/token` * `microsoft_messages` * URL: `https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users/${user_name}/messages?$filter=lastModifiedDateTime ge ${processTime}&$top=1000&$orderby=lastModifiedDateTime desc` * `microsoft_messages_attachments` * URL: `https://graph.microsoft.com/v1.0/users/${user_name}/messages/${mai
